Good picture however towards the end it becomes slightly unstable. The sound is good but out of sync by .2 of a second which is fixable with VLC however with about 5 minutes to go it goes out of sync again, nothing too major just will need to be adjusted. Other than that i would say one of the best copies out to date.

Cheers
